attributes.action: remedy the  excesive waiting times for patients awaiting allocation to a dental practice within the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On application for NHS dentistry you are entered onto a database and informed that you will next be contacted when you have been allocated to a dental practice, anecdotal evidence suggests that this could be years.This policy is bad government,bad management,bad practice all round and leaves the patient with no indication of progress towards their need, ie.access to a dentist for routine dental care.
